name: Move To Frame
description: Move robot to the specified frame in cartesian space.

inputParameters.name: speed
inputParameters.description: Integer specifying TCP translational speed in mm/s.

inputParameters.name: zone
inputParameters.description: Zone data, either an integer or Zone.FINE. Defaults to Zone.FINE.

inputParameters.name: feedback
inputParameters.description: Feedback level. Defaults to DONE. Use together with Zone.FINE to ensure the motion planner has executed the instruction fully.
